text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in https://www.nubc.org/CodeSystem/TypeOfBill
  • Include all codes defined in https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Coding/place-of-service-codes/Place_of_Service_Code_Set

name: X12278LocationType
title: X12 278 Health Care Service Location Type Value Set
publisher: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

description: This set of codes identifies where services were, or may be, performed.  The codes are taken from NUBC Bill Type and from CMS Place of Service codes.
